backend/main.mo: Defines core actor with storage, authorization mixins, and types for institutions, students, SPP settings, and payments, including comparison utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata linking implemented features to source files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human-written summaries for all frontend files, describing their roles in the React/TanStack application.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and themes using OKLCH color tokens for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Inter font and mounting the React app root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup with TanStack Router routes, theme provider, auth gating, and layout integration.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal form for creating a user profile, submitting name, role, and optionally institution via mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper that blocks access until Internet Identity authentication succeeds, showing a login prompt if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Admin layout with sidebar navigation, user info, theme toggle, and content inset based on user profile and router state.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Button that switches between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hook to fetch the current user's profile once the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook handling login, identity loading, state management, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of hooks for student, institution, payment, and settings queries and mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, including palettes, chart colors, and sidebar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/calendar/PaymentCalen: Displays a page wrapper with a placeholder card for an upcoming payment calendar view.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardPa: Fetches dashboard stats and payments, computes chart data, and renders overview cards and visualizations.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentDetai: Loads and displays detailed payment information with actions for printing, downloading, and editing.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFormP: Handles creating or editing a payment with form fields, validation, and submission to backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentsList: Lists payments with search, view, and delete actions, including a confirmation dialog for deletion.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ArrearsReport: Renders a placeholder arrears report page with export buttons and navigation back control.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ClassRecapRep: Page showing class recap report with navigation and export buttons, currently displaying a placeholder message.
frontend/src/pages/reports/InstitutionRe: Page for institution-level payment recap with export options and a placeholder for report data.
frontend/src/pages/reports/MonthlyRecapR: Monthly payment recap page with back navigation, export buttons, and a placeholder message.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ReportsIndexP: Index page listing all report types with icons and navigation to each report.
frontend/src/pages/settings/SppSettingsP: Settings page for configuring tuition amounts, currently showing a placeholder notice.
frontend/src/pages/students/StudentDetai: Displays detailed student info and payment history with edit navigation and cards for student and guardian data.
frontend/src/pages/students/StudentFormP: Form page for creating or editing student records with controlled inputs and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/students/StudentsImpo: Page for importing students via Excel file, currently showing a placeholder for upcoming functionality.
frontend/src/pages/students/StudentsList: Lists students with search, add, import, and delete actions, including confirmation dialogs and status badges.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and layout settings for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, approved architecture, features, and requirements for the school payment management web app.
